mn104:2.4: Vadhoyeva kho → vadhoyeveko (si, sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr)
mn104:2.5: nibbinnarūpā → nibbiṇṇarūpā (cck); nibbindarūpā (sya1ed, sya2ed, km, pts1ed, mr)
mn104:3.1: vassaṁvuṭṭho → vassaṁ vuttho (bj, sya-all, km); vassavuttho (pts1ed)
mn104:5.6: ca kho → santi ca kho (sya-all, km); santi ca (mr)
mn104:7-11.4: micchādiṭṭhi → micchādiṭṭhī (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr)
mn104:16.6: Tassa kho → tassa kho evaṁ (si, sya-all, pts1ed)
mn104:17.13: Tassa kho → tassa kho evaṁ (sya-all, km, mr)
mn104:18.3: vuḍḍhataraṁ bhikkhuṁ → buḍḍhataro bhikkhu (bj, pts1ed); vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu (sya-all, km)
